text: All right, everyone. Elder Ring Night
Ring comes out on May 30th. If I say
your name, you're getting the game. Up
first, Xbox. Wa! This looks amazing.
Wait, it's not on Game Pass. I actually
have to buy a game. Up next, PlayStation
from Software. I know you cooked with
this one. Putting in Nameless King from
Dark Souls II, just like the good old
days. Up next, Steam. Wonder what the
graphics will look like with my $4,000
RTX5090. And that's all. Xbox,
PlayStation, and Steam. You guys enjoy.
Wait. Um, from software, I I think you
forgot about me. Nintendo, you are not
on the list. What? Why? Says here that
the Switch 2 cannot handle Elder Ring
Night
Re. What? No, there must be a mistake.
No mistake. But rest assured that we
knew you'd feel left out of Elden Ring
Night Re. So that's why we're giving you
Bloodborne 2. I mean the dusk bloods.
